relproducts.title: Rimini Miami Yellow - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Well, the name says it all. The rimini's miami yellow is bright, funky, and summery. Due to its lightweight but sturdy fabric, it has a surprising level of opaqueness, despite its light colour. Not that you'll notice, with the colour of sunshine in your window. This is the ideal hue for creating a sunny, cheery kitchen, or a fun, energetic home office. Pair with creams and pretty florals for some country chic, or with sky blue shades for a fun, summery feel.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Solar Yellow Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling stockholm range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This bright, sunny, yellow roller blind brightens any room, making this quality dimout made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Our roller blinds are great for privacy and light control, and come with sleek white components.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Mellow Yellow Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This pastel mellow yellow roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This stockholm dusty yellow fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Solar Yellow Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This bright sunny yellow roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Primrose Yellow
relproducts.description: Stirlo primrose yellow plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.description: Looking for something to perfectly compliment that tonal bathroom scheme you've had in mind? Well we think this premium shimmer black venetian blind would be just perfect. The dramatically dark finish is infused with glittering sparkles, making each slat look like a narrow looking for something to perfectly compliment that tonal bathroom scheme you've had in mind? Well we think this premium shimmer black venetian blind would be just perfect.

relproducts.title: Premium Blue Shimmer Venetian Blind - 25mm Slat
relproducts.description: The electric shade of the premium blue shimmer is stunning enough, but peer closely at the aluminium slats and you'll see the brushed, metallic finish that positively sparkles. Unexpected shadows and highlights spring to life across the slats thanks to that finish, making fo the electric shade of the premium blue shimmer is stunning enough, but peer closely at the aluminium slats and you'll see the brushed, metallic finish that positively sparkles.

relproducts.title: Marble Shimmer - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The intricate texture of marble shimmer invites your eye in to take a closer look at a fabric that is certainly more than it first appears. As you survey the changes in direction of the pattern you quickly lose yourself in the moment and feel at ease. If you want to project the theme around the room then you need to think about other natural patterns you can work in. The undulating texture of slate, the rings on a log slice, and the way in which the light dances with sprung copper would all be interesting things to look at.

relproducts.title: Capella Golden Shimmer - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: When the sun is shining you become fascinated with the myriad ways in which it dances with colours that had never shown a hint of life before. Capella golden shimmer allows you to celebrate that natural beauty all year round with its clever use of luxurious golden threads and timeless floral patterning. Take your decor further towards the luxury end of the spectrum and something magical happens. You feel like you can do anything with your decor, and become inspired to find finishing touches that will speak volumes.

relproducts.title: Shimmer Ochre Yellow Roman Blind
relproducts.description: How opulent would this shimmer roman blind look in your home? It doesnt matter if your place is understated or brimming with lavishness, this ochre blind will be the perfect accent. The plain style wont cloud your living room, but it will generate interest as the sunshine glints off the metallic yarn weve woven through the fabric. relproducts.title: Shimmer Gold Roman Blind
relproducts.description: There are times when another pattern is overkill, but you still want to add a different dimension. The shimmer roman blind does just that.
